timeline.bodyText: This change is unrelated to this PR. Please remove or update commit comment.
timeline.author: vsebe
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -435,11 +435,9 @@ def workflow(SDK_VERSION, SPEC, SHAS, OPENJDK_REPO, OPENJDK_BRANCH, OPENJ9_REPO,
             }
             echo "TEST_FLAG:'${TEST_FLAG}'"
 
-            def extraTestLabels = EXTRA_TEST_LABELS[target] ?: ''
-            echo "Target:'${target}' extraTestLabels:'${extraTestLabels}'"
-
+            def extraTestLabels = EXTRA_TEST_LABELS[target]

timeline.message:
Fix test target excludes

- String comparision was broken because target
  in the loop was a GStringImpl which is different
  than the excludes list which are Strings.
- Also simplify extraTestLabels local def since
  we've already guaranteed not null when it was
  defined earlier.

related #8421
[skip ci]
Signed-off-by: Adam Brousseau <adam.brousseau88@gmail.com>
